title: feat: Benchmarking environment and hyper parameters.
body:
Hi @LinasKo and @onuralpszr , for creating this leaderboard. This leaderboard this really helpful for model selection.

I think you should mention what environment is used and what hyperparameters are used in website.

Here are some possible information:
- Python version
- machine used to validate
- confidence threshold
- batch size etc.
author: hmasum52

comments.body:
Excellent point!

In fact, that's what we were planning next, but more focused on parameters such as confidence and IoU threshold.

Until we start benchmarking the memory & speed, we found the results were almost identical on any machine we tested (5th digit difference between GPU and CPU runs).

@hmasum52  I just finished adding run parameters and showed in website so I am closing this as complete :) Feel free to re-open or open issue ðŸ‘‹   

Completed via : #31
